output.sentences: People gathered around the choir as they were listening.
The political group running the show started after time because some people were late.
The sun was shinning, people were learning, and everyone was enjoying themselves.
After the choir song everyone was now waiting for the president to make his speech.
It was a beautiful day in town and everyone couldnt wait to see the statue that was dedicated to the president.
